channel.title: Jagex is run by a bunch of 1st graders who can't read, or write... PICS
channel.description:
Ok well the other day (yesterday to be exact) I was talking to a person who I know hacked me cause they are one of my friends, or at least used to be, and I read the ip adress that was last logged into my account when I logged on one day, noticed it was not my ip, and matched it with his, via hamachi. Well I was talking to him about it and he reported me, for god knows why. And this is everything that happened... I am now muted for 3 days.
BTW, rule 9= encouraging others to break the rules.
PICS
[IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/ban1.jpg[/img]
[size=24pt]EVIDENCE[/size]
[IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/ban2.jpg[/img]
[size=24pt]My APPEAL:[/size]
[IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/ban3.jpg[/img]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
As you can see they can not read the report, and cannont read an appeal, and lastly cannot type their own message... It's an automated message... I know cause they ahve sent the same message to me before...

item.title: Jagex is run by a bunch of 1st graders who can't read, or write... PICS
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Tree, I’m learning it, and it’s true.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex is run by a bunch of 1st graders who can't read, or write... PICS
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:22, topic:171346”][quote author=xX00java00Xx link=topic=231378.msg1984897#msg1984897 date=1199772955]

Try getting over 10000 appeals per day and not using a auto mater.

Hmmm… let me think they also have a whole team diducated to reading and taking care of appeals… Not to metions they get paid…

You got banned? WE DONT CARE dont post about it

Wow are you a blind retard?..
[/quote]

Go back to mscp, I can tell by your sig.

And you could’ve said blind without the retard, making it a flame.[/quote]
I swear you were the guy who claimed to know C++.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex is run by a bunch of 1st graders who can't read, or write... PICS
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

xX00java00Xx:

LOL! exactly! they ban players for macroing, when in fact, they are doing the same thing!!! Banning autoers, by using an auto-banner!!! hahaha… never thought about that.

No, they’re not exactly hypocrites, because macros give an unfair advantage over other players. Their auto-banning gives them an unfair advantage over nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex is run by a bunch of 1st graders who can't read, or write... PICS
item.dc:creator: @xX00java00Xx xX00java00Xx
item.description:
@xX00java00Xx wrote:

[quote=“Rajae, post:11, topic:171346”][quote author=xX00java00Xx link=topic=231378.msg1982196#msg1982196 date=1199666912]

Some friend who reports you

Exactly… Everyone look out for him. His accounts:

L00t like me
Sk8rbito

His IP:
5.27.162.59

(he joins private servers oftten and he uses those same names… So if you see him, BAN him… He played on mine and others and ALWAYS breaks the rules… Ban his I.P. EVERYONE. He can not be trusted.
[/quote]

Say that in www.moparisthebest.com/smf, everyone will do it.

Yes, I agree, JaGeX is a very unintelligent company. They have no other ways of solving their customer support problems other than an automatic denial, or a random acceptance. They are well aware of the fact that they are not helping the game through their own bots.[/quote]
LOL! exactly! they ban players for macroing, when in fact, they are doing the same thing!!! Banning autoers, by using an auto-banner!!! hahaha… never thought about that.

Read full topic

(he joins private servers oftten and he uses those same names… So if you see him, BAN him… He played on mine and others and ALWAYS breaks the rules… Ban his I.P. EVERYONE. He can not be trusted.[/quote]

Say that in www.moparisthebest.com/smf, everyone will do it.

Yes, I agree, JaGeX is a very unintelligent company. They have no other ways of solving their customer support problems other than an automatic denial, or a random acceptance. They are well aware of the fact that they are not helping the game through their own bots.

item.description:

[quote=“Casey., post:5, topic:171346”]Jagex interprets Hamachi to be moparscape, moparscape falls under rule 9 so theirs an explanation.

Also, we don’t care.[/quote]

item.title: Jagex is run by a bunch of 1st graders who can't read, or write... PICS
item.dc:creator: @xX00java00Xx xX00java00Xx
item.description:
@xX00java00Xx wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:5, topic:171346”]Jagex interprets Hamachi to be moparscape, moparscape falls under rule 9 so theirs an explanation.

Also, we don’t care.[/quote]
I’m just showing everyone how retarted jagex is… And they can’t interperet hamachi as mopar since hamachi is used for many other things… Thats like saying I have a website creator and they interperet that I am making porn with it just because I have a website maker. Mopar is a very SMALL catagory that falls under hamachi.
EDIT: Not to mention that if he were using hamachi, it would be at his own will… No where in that evidence did i say “oh, go use hamachi” or “Play moparscape” I said I matched it with is ip on hamachi.

Read full topic
